concept.title: JDBC Consumer
concept.shortdesc: The JDBC Consumer origin uses a JDBC connection to read database data. JDBC Consumer returns data as a map with column names and field values.

conbody.p: originsJDBC ConsumerJDBC Consumer originoverviewWhen you configure JDBC Consumer, you specify connection information, query interval, and custom JDBC configuration properties to determine how JDBC Consumer connects to the database. You configure the query mode, offset column, initial offset value, and SQL query to define the data returned by the database.
You can also configure add custom properties that your driver requires and configure additional properties for older driver versions.
